text: ai ahale kitaab apane deen mein had (etadaal) se tajaavuz na karo aur khuda kee shaan mein sach ke siva (koee doosaree baat) na kaho mariyam ke bete eesa maseeh (na khuda the na khuda ke bete) pas khuda ke ek rasool aur usake kalame (hukm) the jise khuda ne mariyam ke paas bhej diya tha (ki haamala ho ja) aur khuda kee taraf se ek jaan the pas khuda aur usake rasoolon par eemaan lao aur teen (khuda) ke qaayal na bano (tasalees se) baaz raho (aur) apanee bhalaee (tauheed) ka qasad karo allaah to bas yakata maabood hai vah us (nuks) se paak va paakeeza hai usaka koee ladaka ho (use ladake kee haajat hee kya hai) jo kuchh aasamaanon mein hai aur jo kuchh zameen mein hai sab to usee ka hai aur khuda to kaarasaazee mein kaafee hai
